iata:packageLineID.description: Logistics Unit ID. The package ID is an incremental number that identifies each logistic unit being described.

iata:packageLineIDofParent.description: id of the parent record that is grouping this package

iata:packageCustomsOriginCode.description: Code indicating the origin of goods for Customs purposes (e.g. For goods in free circulation in the EU) List to be provided by local customs authorities

iata:packageLevelCode.description: package grouping level starting from 0 at smallest level

iata:packageTypeCode.description: Identifies the Logistic Unit package type. From code list UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II.

iata:packageTypeDescription.description: Describes the Logistic Unit package type mentioned in the code list UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II.

iata:packageULDtype.description: Code identifying a standard Unit Load Device type

iata:packageULDataDesignator.description: Code identifying US/ATA Unit Load Device type

iata:packageULDownerCode.description: Code to identify the owner of a Unit Load Device (Actual format is aa, an or na. Owner can be an airline or leasing company.)

iata:packageULDloadingIndicator.description: Code indicating ULD height or loading limitation

iata:packageContentDescription.description: General description of the contents (as opposed to a detailed description of items/articles)

iata:packageShippingMarks.description: Describes the marks and numbers on a transport unit or package. Free text.

iata:packageUPIDissuer.description: Reference identifying how the package is marked. Field is hardcode to 'SSCC-18', 'UPC' or 'Other'

iata:packageUPID.description: SSCC-18 code for the value of the package mark, company or bar code, free text, pallet code, etc.

iata:packageTareWeight.description: weight of the empty package or container

iata:packageNetWeight.description: total of package tare weight plus contents gross weight plus filliing material weight

iata:packageGrossWeight.description: total of package tare weight plus contents gross weight plus filliing material weight

iata:packageVolume.description: volume of the package or container
